explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the relationship between the quality of voluntary disclosure (QVD) and earnings management (EM) in the context of Middle Eastern and North African banks. It employs statistical methods like ordinary least squares regression, instrumental variable regression, and two-stage least squares models to analyze this relationship. None of the provided keywords related to machine learning, neural networks, or other advanced computational techniques are mentioned or implied in the title or abstract. The study is grounded in financial and economic analysis rather than computational or machine learning methods.
